moduslam.setup_manager.config_validator module

moduslam.setup_manager.config_validator.register_config()[source]

Registers base configs for Hydra validation schema: https://hydra.cc/docs/tutorials/structured_config/schema/

Sets up SLAM system before start.

moduslam.setup_manager.tables_initializer module

The module contains functions for initializing tables with different connections.

moduslam.setup_manager.tables_initializer.init_handler_state_analyzer_table(input_table: dict[str, str]) → dict[Handler, StateAnalyzer][source]

Creates “handler -> state analyzer” table for the given input table.

Parameters:

input_table – “handler name -> state analyzer name” table.

Returns:

“handler -> state analyzer” table.

Raises:

ValueError – if the input table is empty.

moduslam.setup_manager.tables_initializer.init_handler_edge_factory_table(input_table: dict[str, str]) → dict[Handler, EdgeFactory][source]

Creates “handler -> edge factory” table for the given input table.

Parameters:

input_table – “handler name -> edge factory name” table.

Returns:

“handler -> edge factory” table.

Raises:

ValueError – if the input table is empty.

moduslam.setup_manager.tables_initializer.init_sensor_handler_table(input_table: dict[str, list[str]]) → dict[Sensor, list[Handler]][source]

Creates “sensor -> handlers” table for the given input table.

Parameters:

input_table – “sensor name -> list of handler names” table.

Returns:

“sensor -> handlers” table.

Raises:

ValueError – if the input table is empty.
